#summary Tamarin images you can use to customize your Tamarin installation.
#labels AdminSupport


= Images =

You may copy the image files from [http://zach.tomaszewski.name/tamarin/images/ here].  Below are examples, including the required attribution text for each Creative Commons image.  To install, save a copy of the image into your htdocs/ folder.  Then replace the necessary HTML code in your index.html page with the provided code.

<br>
